get.description: Retrieve a run for an app in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

specification_hash.description: Hash of the app specification. Ensures API compatibility across app iterations.

inputs.description: Array of input objects for the app

stream.description: If true, the response will be streamed

blocking.description: If true, the request will block until the run is complete

block_filter.description: Array of block names to filter the response

200.description: App run created and executed successfully

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

get.description: Get data sources in the workspace identified by {wId}.
Get usage data for the workspace identified by {wId} in CSV format.

parameters.name: wId
parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date in YYYY-MM format

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date in YYYY-MM format (required when mode is 'range')

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode of date range selection ('month' or 'range')

parameters.name: table
parameters.description:
The name of the usage table to retrieve:
- "users": The list of users categorized by their activity level.
- "assistant_messages": The list of messages sent by users including the mentioned assistants.
- "builders": The list of builders categorized by their activity level.
- "assistants": The list of workspace assistants and their corresponding usage.
- "all": A concatenation of all the above tables.

200.description: The usage data in CSV format or a ZIP of multiple CSVs if table is equal to "all"

403.description: The workspace does not have access to the usage data API

BearerAuth.description: Your DUST API key is a Bearer token.
